snippet: The American, Keith Broomfield of Massachusetts, died June 3 in a battle in a Syrian village near the border town of Kobani.
abstract: State Department confirms death of Keith Broomfield of Massachusetts, killed in Syria while fighting alongside Kurdish fighters against Islamic State forces near Kobani.
lead_paragraph: The American, Keith Broomfield of Massachusetts, died June 3 in a battle in a Syrian village near the border town of Kobani.

headline.main: Syria: An American Dies in a Battle
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Syria: An American Dies in a Battle
